questions.question: What is the purpose of the <template> element?
options: To define a template for content that can be reused
To define a section of a document
questions.correct_answer: To define a template for content that can be reused

questions.question: Which HTML5 element is used to represent self-contained content?
questions.correct_answer: <article>

questions.question: What does the 'data-' attribute in HTML5 allow you to do?
options: Store user data in a cookie
Define custom data attributes for elements
questions.correct_answer: Define custom data attributes for elements

questions.question: What is the function of the <dialog> element?
questions.correct_answer: To create modal dialogs

questions.question: Which HTML5 element is used to specify the navigation links?
questions.correct_answer: <nav>

questions.question: What is the purpose of the <picture> element?
options: To define multiple image sources for different screen sizes
questions.correct_answer: To define multiple image sources for different screen sizes

questions.question: What does the 'srcset' attribute do?
options: Specifies multiple image sources for responsive images
questions.correct_answer: Specifies multiple image sources for responsive images

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to embed an SVG image?
questions.correct_answer: <svg>

questions.question: What does the <source> element do?
options: Defines alternative media resources for elements like <audio> and <video>
questions.correct_answer: Defines alternative media resources for elements like <audio> and <video>

questions.question: Which attribute is used with the <input> element to specify that it is a required field?
questions.correct_answer: required

questions.question: What does the <meter> element represent?
options: A measurement within a known range
questions.correct_answer: A measurement within a known range

questions.question: What is the purpose of the <address> element?
options: To specify contact information for a person or organization
To define a block of text
questions.correct_answer: To specify contact information for a person or organization

questions.question: Which attribute specifies the character set for an HTML document?
questions.correct_answer: charset

questions.question: What does the <fieldset> element do?
options: Groups related elements in a form
questions.correct_answer: Groups related elements in a form

questions.question: What is the difference between <div> and <section>?
questions.correct_answer: <section> is semantic, <div> is not

questions.question: What is the purpose of the <summary> tag?
options: To define a summary of a document
To create a heading for a section
To provide a summary for a <details> element
questions.correct_answer: To provide a summary for a <details> element

questions.question: Which HTML5 attribute allows you to specify the size of an input element?
questions.correct_answer: size

questions.question: What does the <noscript> tag do?
options: Displays content if JavaScript is disabled
questions.correct_answer: Displays content if JavaScript is disabled

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to define a time period?
questions.correct_answer: <time>

questions.question: What does the <progress> element represent?
options: A measurement of progress in a task
questions.correct_answer: A measurement of progress in a task

questions.question: Which attribute is used to specify the target of a hyperlink?
questions.correct_answer: target

questions.question: What does the 'autoplay' attribute do in the <video> element?
questions.correct_answer: Starts playback automatically

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to define a header for a document or section?
questions.correct_answer: <header>

questions.question: What does the 'download' attribute do for hyperlinks?
options: Specifies that the target will be downloaded when the link is clicked
questions.correct_answer: Specifies that the target will be downloaded when the link is clicked

questions.question: Which tag is used to create a multi-line text input?
questions.correct_answer: <textarea>

questions.question: What is the purpose of the <wbr> tag?
options: Indicates where a line break may occur
questions.correct_answer: Indicates where a line break may occur

questions.question: What does the <bdi> tag do?
options: Isolates a span of text to prevent it from being affected by surrounding text direction
questions.correct_answer: Isolates a span of text to prevent it from being affected by surrounding text direction

questions.question: Which HTML5 element allows for audio playback?
questions.correct_answer: <audio>

questions.question: What does the 'defer' attribute do in the <script> tag?
options: Specifies that the script is executed when the page is loaded
Loads the script before the page is rendered
Runs the script after the document has been parsed
questions.correct_answer: Runs the script after the document has been parsed

questions.question: What does the 'crossorigin' attribute do?
options: Specifies how to handle cross-origin requests
questions.correct_answer: Specifies how to handle cross-origin requests
